column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We both ordered the Malnati Chicago Classic pizza with a side order of three-cheese bread.  No wonder the low carb diet doesn't work for me!  Anyway
column2: Malnati's famous "Buttercrust" did not dissapoint!  It was absolutely delicious!  The sausage was so tasty and the tomato sauce and cheese were just right.  It was the perfect pizza.
